author: Curt Christiansen
comment: Very nice face for the Huewei watch. Only hands when the screen is off. Otherwise shows day of week, battery of watch, battery of phone, temp, steps, and digital click under the analog for those who can't read watch hands.  Opening apps appears to only be a paid function. Another nice one is their Rolling Watch Face.

author: Yuval Yaniv
comment: Still no support for Android Wear 2.0 Complications... And no response from dev... Disappointing...

author: michaeL cuito
comment: stopwatch not working. a waste of money for a premium access. specially when the interactive feature does not seem to work. you have to force stop the app on your phone to regain the interactive functions.

author: ALFONSO MIRELES
comment: I wasn't willing to pay for a watch face. I did buy this one. No regrets

author: Toh Siang Goh
comment: Why doesn't the app picker show all the apps I have? And thr random colour toggling is very annoying. I think there is enough feedback here that something should be done.

Really like this face. Accommodates everything I'm looking for on the main face.  My big complaint though is that the ambient hands on the black background are way too bright. They need to have configurable color for sure.

author: Kristopher Guthrie
comment: It's a great watch face, but I have a ZTE Quartz watch and everything seems to be working except the phone battery percentage. I can completely charge my phone and the watch face still shows 0%. I have tried everything, even resyncing, but no dice.

author: Pete Loach
comment: Not easy to select watch faces.

author: William Judd
comment: Doesn't work with Samsung watches
Amazing in every way!

author: Alexandru Octavian
comment: Great app for my Moto 360.

author: m.nadeem04 nadeem
comment: Good luck
Great

author: Hoang Anh
comment: Great

author: Kethon Troupe
comment: 1 of the best watch face, everything is pretty accurate. 👍👍

author: sheeraz qamar
comment: Good

author: Apayy SZ
comment: I paid for this watch face but unable to use it at my Huawei watch 2. I paid for nothing. Useless.  And I can't find Watchface app as recommended by you.  Update: Installed directly from my phone via Android Wear app. Then another try via phone Play Store. Update 2: I already did that twice, installed from the watch still can't find the watch face inside the watch.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please send us an email for better assistance.

author: Romuald B
comment: I downloaded for my Huawei 2 but nothing happens, what is wrong? Other guy (from review below)seams to have problem too.Too bad as I think is has fantastic,cool watch faces. Please fix this problem and I will give 5 🌟. I don't mind paying for staff that works.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, install the watch face from Wear store located on the watch.

author: Guruprasad N
comment: I am a pro user.  I like it . But two things have to be fixed. 1. Auto update of mobile phone charge % as it's not reflecting right %. Steps count not updated though it's connected with Google fit..

author: Ashraf Botros
comment: Nice looking watch face however all this can be avoided if clear instructions was included

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, we suggested to send us an email because of quick correspondence and help. Also, check other reviews from other happy users which have installed the watchface properly. FYI, check some articles how to install the watchface on Android Wear 2.0 smartwatches.

author: Troy Koester
comment: Couldn't use it for a while, uninstalled it, and now it works again. Wish the always on display way a but more customizable but I'm satisfied with what I've got

author: Vincent G. Smith, Jr.
comment: I couldn't even download the watchfaces, everytime I tried to it would take me to the pay store to download the app.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, please install the watchface from Wear store located on the watch. UPDATE: any update about this issue?

author: Ray Blackmore
comment: Can't open clock. Useless

author: Nycholas Hao
comment: It's easy to use with my Moto360 1st gen.

author: Kishan Kumar
comment: Doesn't work on moto 360 gen 2 all the updates are very slow. Time will never update battery notification does not work. Want a refund

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: What doesn't work? We tested it on moto 2 gen. Update: send us the order number

comment: background colours changing itself almost daily. Weather updates work intermitantly, often have to update it manually

author: jaidon rymer
comment: This is a beautiful watch face with alot of functionality, however it has one big problem at the moment, the watch face colour's keep changing by themselves! If you fix this bug I will amend my review to 5 stars (using Pro version)

author: Avishay Patoka
comment: My lg g watch r doesn't work with any of the richfaces i've purchased since the new android wear

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, just install the watchfaces from wear store on your watch.

author: Ezra Brown
comment: I can not get the features to work with my ZTE Quartz Watch. I have re sync ed several times with no luck
This is my favorite watch face for my LG Urbane. Recent update caused battery and app issues. Developers corrected quickly. Great watch face and highly customizable.

author: Stuart Freeman
comment: Works perfectly on Huawei W1. You can fully customise this watch face from the app for a very small fee which is worth it in my eyes. Great job.

author: Pouya Aein
comment: Installed the app, paid for premium, doesnt launch on moto 360. Scam!!

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, could  you  , please,  check what version of google play services you have on both devices? Send us an email for better assistance.

author: John Wayne Coley
comment: I can't use it on my gear 3. I followed the instructions...reset everything more then a few times...and I still can't get it to work

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content: Hi, have you read the description? You can use it only on Android Wear devices.

author: Jack Packlaian
comment: Great watches but it would be awesome if you were to show pics of of what AMBIENT mode looks like for full purchases....JS

author: Chris Brandt
comment: This watch face is exactly what I needed for my LG Urbane watch! Working as described and working great. Worth the money.

author: Richard Finden
comment: Nice  face like it alot but always shows 89% on phone battery the temperature is always 19c thats only things i can fine worn with it

author: Jr Smilez
comment: Great, simple to use with lots of options! I can see me using this for a long time.
